meanings.definition: A woman who washes and irons clothes for a living.
meanings.sent1: The laundresses in our neighborhood always make sure our clothes are clean and fresh.
meanings.sent2: I dropped off my shirts at the laundresses' shop to be cleaned.
meanings.sent3: The laundresses joked that they could iron a shirt blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The laundresses' hands moved like lightning as they tackled the pile of clothes.
meanings.sent5: The laundresses' dedication to their work is truly admirable.

meanings.definition: Women who work in a laundry.
meanings.sent1: The laundresses at the local laundry are always busy sorting clothes.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of laundresses chatting during their break at the laundry.
meanings.sent3: The laundresses at the laundry had a friendly competition on who could fold the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The laundresses in the laundry room hummed a cheerful tune while working.
meanings.sent5: The laundresses efficiently managed the laundry operations with precision.
